description:
The versatile Norrøna Shirt is a classic, clean, and easy-care trial shirt perfect for outdoor endeavors and the time in-between. The shirt is based on the timeless look and superior versatility of the Poplin shirt. It's made in a functional organic cotton /recycled nylon/elastane mix to achieve the perfect combination of comfort, durability, and sustainability.

The fabric is wind-resistant, quick-drying and offers high UPF sun protection, so you don't have to make any compromises when looking for premium outdoor functionality and timeless style. Smart features and details include subtle chest pockets, classic button-down front, cuffs with button adjustments, articulated reinforced elbows, and a small logo on the chest.
name: Norrona Norrona LS Shirt - Mens
